Plot: Two former U. S. Presidents, hated rivals, join forces to expose the current, corrupt President at the risk of their lives.
Title: My Fellow Americans
Writer: E. Jack Kaplan (story), Richard Chapman (story), E. Jack Kaplan (screenplay), Richard Chapman (screenplay), Peter Tolan (screenplay)
Actors: Jack Lemmon, James Garner, Dan Aykroyd, John Heard
